summary: This mod adds a basement to Breezehome complete with an enchantment table, extra storage, bookshelves, weapon racks and displays.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]q_XCrCHiXCk[/youtube]

This mod gives Breezehome a basement while keeping things balanced. The trapdoor to the basement can only be reached after purchasing the Alchemy Laboratory. The basement includes a number of items to put it on par with other playerhomes such as:
- enchantment table
- 2 storage chests
- 2 strong boxes
- 2 bookshelves that hold 12 books each
- dagger display case
- 2 slot weapon rack
- wardrobe
- 3 barrels and 5 sacks for extra storage
- random clutter to go along with the room

This mod can also be found at:

Steam - [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=805488]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=805488[/url]

Be sure to check out my website and subscribe to me on YouTube for more!

Website - [url=http://www.demorus.com]www.demorus.com[/url]
YouTube - [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/demothekeysmasher]DemoTheKeySmasher[/url]
Twitter - [url=http://www.twitter.com/demotks]DemoTKS[/url]

Have fun!
author: Demorus
